players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "This is terrible! Charlie was killed by the mafia. We need to be very careful about who we trust. I'm suspicious of Alice - she seems too eager to point fingers without much evidence."
Bob: "Diana, that's interesting you're immediately suspicious of Alice when she hasn't even spoken yet. Why are you so quick to deflect suspicion onto her? That seems like mafia behavior to me."

You: "Bob makes a good point. Diana, you accused me before I even said anything - that's very suspicious behavior. I investigated Diana last night and discovered she's the mafioso. We need to vote her out."

You: "Diana is deflecting and trying to cast doubt on me because she knows I found her out. Bob, we must vote Diana out now or the mafia wins. She killed Charlie and will kill one of us tonight if we don't "

Diana: "Alice is lying! She's trying to frame me because she's the real mafioso. Think about it Bob - why would she claim to 'investigate' me so conveniently? She killed Charlie and now wants to eliminate me!"
Bob: "Alice's claim to be the detective and investigate Diana makes the most sense. Diana immediately accused Alice before she even spoke, which is classic mafia deflection. I'm voting Diana."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested
